title: Software Engineer
description: Work as a software engineering consultant to clients

title: Software Engineer
description: Work supporting and modernizing legacy backend systems around business to business invoicing
stack: C#, Kotlin, Spring Boot, MSSQL, GCP, Javascript
items: Supported and modernized legacy backend applications
Improved team's productivity through coaching good development/delivery practices
Designed and facilitated learning sessions around topics like testing and TDD
Created and helped maintained team onboarding documentation/process

title: Software Engineer
description: Worked as a consultant to clients as well as worked on internal projects.
items: Conducted peer interviews for potential engineers
Presented talks and workshops on-site and conferences
Coached and paired with other teams and individuals on testing practices
Founded a QA/testing community of practice
Implemented tool to migrate all company repositories from Bamboo to Github
Implemented tool to scrap a client's legacy website for text & images and upload to their new site

title: Test Lead
description: Oversaw quality and testing practices on a feature team. Helped deliver the feature from concept to the first beta users.
stack: AWS, Angular, Protractor, Typescript, Runscope, Azure DevOps, Python, Locust, MSSQL
items: Wrote test cases for features implemented by team
Tested features implemented by team
Worked with product owner to accept features
Implemented contract testing for a third party API required for team's primary feature
Reworked existing end to end test suite to improve stability, code consistency
Implemented parameterization on end to end test suite to reuse existing tests for team's feature testing
Provided cross team quality/testing coaching and support

title: Senior Software Engineer
description: An R&D cross functional feature team delivering ag data applications and services. The team was heavily focused on TDD and pair programming.
stack: AWS, Java, Spring Boot, jUnit, React, Jest, Typescript, Scala, Python, Ruby, Groovy, Jenkins, Swagger, Gatling, Prometheus, webdriver.io
items: Worked on several projects directly involved with initial conversations with business, requirements gathering, acceptance criteria, technical spikes and assessments, implementation, deployment, integration with other systems, security, documentation, releasing to beta, fixing initial bugs, releasing to production and providing 24 on call support, updating and maintaining application
Maintained a large family of 26 inherited legacy applications/services each deploy in 4 environments with varying stacks
Served as the team's frontend lead helping guide implementation choices as well as providing help with html, css, javascript, React
Developed several applications both backend (Java, Spring Boot, Scala) and frontend (React)
Worked on several company community owned libraries to delivery our features
Deployed and maintained infrastructure as code in AWS using CloudFormation templates
Created and maintained swagger documents for APIs
Created and implemented data backup plans and strategies
Implemented features from other teams' backlogs to unblock our delivery
Worked on several company and team hack-a-thon projects

Served as the team's test lead developing testing practices, providing insight to risk mitigation, testing concerns to the team and business, quality and testing (including unit testing) coaching to the team through pairing and katas, and championing testing be included with development and devops as tasks not roles
Cross team quality and testing coaching
Developed several testing tools for the team
Implemented load and stress tests for APIs using Gatling
Implemented end to end tests using webdriver.io
Implemented end to end fitness tests for team developed features in company's monolith service

title: Software Engineer
description: Responsible for implementing system acceptance testing using Protractor across multiple applications.
items: Cleared lengthy backlog of test automation
Standardized all protractor test suites and page object implementations
Standardized how test data was defined and used
Integrated protractor tests in to continuous integration/deployment pipeline
Implemented load and stress testing of the API using JMeter
Implemented script for generating JMeter test plans from telemetry data

title: Software Engineer

Implemented a CICD pipeline to deploy builds to the Apple Store via TestFlight
Implemented system acceptance testing for a cross platform mobile application developed with Xamarin
Implemented a web app in Angular for visualizing spatiotemporal ag data onto a map

title: Quality Engineer
description: An evergreen Test Automation team. Lead those efforts through a subcommittee to develop technology stack, processes, documentation & best practices.
items: Acted as the business channel's test lead
Managed a small team of four remote testers
Delivered all test automation for business channel
Collaborated with product owner, test lead & developers to create test strategy for business channel and test plans for products
Participated in a subcommittee for the stack, processes, documentation and best practices for test automation
Deployed a jenkins instance and CICD pipelines for test automation suites
Implemented a greenfield test framework and runner in Python for selenium/webdriver tests to meet business's specific requirements
Implemented library for parsing and validating DTCC data files (POV, COM, FAR)
Implemented library for parsing PDF files and validating them against a template PDF file
Implemented roles based security end to end test suite
Created automation suite to input data in to Trilogy DCM using declarative data files
Rotated scrum master role among business channel test leads

title: Quality Engineer
description: A 100% remote startup. Responsible for designing, implementing and maintaining system acceptance testing across multiple applications/environments.
stack: AWS, Ruby, Ruby On Rails, jQuery, Webdriver, RSpec, Jenkins, Postgres, Redis
items: Automated a large portion of the manual regression test suite. This allowed the other QA to focus on exploratory testing and I could pick up development stories
Created a frontend application for text scraping web sites using a rule system based on url pattern matching
Created a frontend application to filter a high throughput data stream using naive bayesian classification and set logic
Created a frontend application for end users to train text classification categories using Amazon's Mechanical Turk service
Created and trained several text classification categories
Implemented continuous integration deployment pipeline in Jenkins
Implemented end to end and integration testing of internal/external APIs
Implemented stress testing of applications and APIs using JMeter
Implemented unit tests for existing untested code
Implemented a k-fold cross validation tool for testing our data sets
